Name: Kagetsu

Review Text:
Kagetsu is a cosy Japanese restaurant in the heart of west Amsterdam.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Atmosphere: 5 stars - cozy and good location on 9 Straatjes. They have some tiny tables on the sidewalk now. …

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: The atmosphere is quite cool and cozy. Overall arrangement of the dishes looked very inauthentic, and the sushi was falling apart. Staff didn't serve us properly.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Fantastic quality foods and excellent flavours! Very gevellig and great environment

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Amazing food. One of the best sushi and sashimi I've ever had. Melts in your mouth!!

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: A delicious meal and friendly service in English/Japanese. I had the chicken katsu curry and it was very flavourful. I also enjoyed a warm sake which was very reasonably priced. The food may seem a bit expensive but the taste was worth it! Quaint and warm decor all through out- I will definitely be back!

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: The food is very good, although the device tends to be quite slow. For more than a couple people I'd recommend to book in advance.

Name: Kagetsu

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Excellent food, excellent service, gezellige sfeer. Liked everything about it.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text:
The sushi rolls were very average in taste. The rice was extremely sticky though, and the rolls didnt hold their shape well...
I expected better quality for these prices.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Restaurant must have had an off night, because it is wonderfully decorated with great reviews.  But the service was tortuously slow (30 minutes before ordering drinks) and we were told that they only sell bottle water and not give tap water.  If the food ever arrives, I hope it is similar to other reviewers experience.

Name: Kagetsu

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Taste and quality of the food are amazing! The atmosphere is really relaxing and the staff is extremely friendly. A good spot to go to if you want good Japanese food in Amsterdam

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Great food, with very competitive price. I had a lunch box and it was very good

Review Text: Not strangers to sushi, we ordered and received our rolls. They're very large but the seaweed was soft? Not sure if kitchen  just had an off day. Service was good.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Excellent service and great sushi. Fresh fish and very nice rice. The service was kind and friendly. We easily ordered much more than was healthy for us.

Name: Kagetsu

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: This is a very nice Japanese restaurant. Small but they can fit many people in here. We had the Curry menu. Very filling. You won't go away hungry. In the Negenstratjes neighborhood. It's easy to walk by it. So look carefully.

Name: Kagetsu

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: You need to be extremely Zen when ordering a meal. It takes forever to get your dinner served. It would be nice to let us know the waiting time before we decide to order. Very bad.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Fantastic food for an affordable price. Service is quick and courteous. Would recommend to anybody who likes Asian cuisine.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Food was good and prices reasonable for Amsterdam but unbelievably disorganised and slow service...  shame really. We weren’t the only table struggling to get served - heard others complaining too.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text:
Fast service and incredible food!
Very friendly waiter, speaks english
You definetly need to try the philadelphia rolls and the nabeyaki udon!

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Fantastic, calming atmosphere to take a break from the busy Amsterdam streets. Great food & service.  Definitely worth a visit!

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: The staff was friendly and the atmosphere was very soothing and relaxing. The food was a bit unimaginative, but there was plenty and it was served quickly.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Great sushi place! I do not recognise the negative reviews, to be honest.

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Really nice Japanese food at a great price, there are two restaurants in Amsterdam, this is the one that makes sushi, in the other location there are only hot dishes

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Service subpar; food was cold and had to be sent back to warm up, drinks not served for at least 20 mins (it wasn't busy?), starters arrived before drinks. Food was okay, nothing special

Name: Kagetsu
Review Text: Great little place with authentic Japanese kitchen. Just behind the Dam square. It's a fantastic place to end your Amsterdam tour.
